mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zx_system_log ( log_username, log_content, log_operation, log_usercpyid, log_userid, log_userrealname, log_ip, log_url, log_func_resource_code, log_func_code, log_resource_name ) VALUES ( #{logUsername}, #{logContent}, #{logOperation}, #{logUsercpyid}, #{logUserid}, #{logUserrealname}, #{logIp}, #{logUrl}, #{logFuncResourceCode}, #{logFuncCode}, #{logResourceName} )
mapper.select:
SELECT id AS id, log_username AS logUsername, log_createdate AS logCreatedate, log_content AS logContent, log_operation AS logOperation, log_usercpyid AS logUsercpyid, log_userid AS logUserid, log_userrealname AS logUserrealname, log_ip AS logIp, log_url AS logUrl, log_func_resource_code AS logFuncResourceCode, log_func_code AS logFuncCode, log_resource_name AS logResourceName FROM zx_system_log WHERE 1 = 1
and log_func_code = #{logFuncCode}
and log_username like '%${logUsername}%'
ORDER BY log_createdate desc
